mentoring.title:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the mentoring communication preferences section
**UI Location**: Settings → Communication Preferences Form (Mentoring section header)
**When Users See This**: When viewing communication preferences
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Mentoring"
product.title:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the product communication preferences section
**UI Location**: Settings → Communication Preferences Form (Product section header)
**When Users See This**: When viewing communication preferences
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Product"
formButton.changePreferences:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to submit changes to communication preferences
**UI Location**: Settings → Communication Preferences Form (footer button)
**When Users See This**: After making changes to their communication preferences
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Change preferences"
successMessage.updatedPreferences:
**Functional Purpose**: Success message displayed after preferences are updated
**UI Location**: Settings → Communication Preferences Form (success message area)
**When Users See This**: Immediately after successfully changing communication preferences
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Your preferences have been updated"
